text:
On brand new machines, try rebooting and see if a second time lets it come
through. I've set up new laptops recently and it's sometimes taken a second time
to start behaving. 
Alternatively do a reinstall over the top. 
On Monday, February 5, 2024 at 07:30:59 AM PST, Calvin McLennan
<
%40mail.yahoo.com

metadata.topic: issues with Windows 11 KB5034204 - rolls back immediately on boot
metadata.subject: Re: [patchmanagement] issues with Windows 11 KB5034204 - rolls back immediately on boot
